arr.name: dc.description
arr.str: A Full-colour 20-page children's project book (non-language specific), including reference pages with activities, a picture dictionary presenting the lexicon divided into named grammatical categories (nouns, adjectives, prepositions and adverbs, and verbs), and a back-cover extension activity. The dictionary section of each project book presents over 100 lexical items in a table of illustrated word-boxes for children to record the target-language word. Each box is identified by a reference number which cross-references with the reference cards to allow children to independently access information. The records for the pupil questionnaires (biodata and attitude); prior input questionnaires; metalinguistic knowledge tasks and L2 French listening,reading,writing and grammar tests used in this study are all linked on IRIS. There were many teaching materials used throughout the study, if you would like to know more about the other materials used, please contact Angela Tellier
